java.rmi
Class ServerError

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Throwable

              +--java.io.IOException
                    |
                    +--java.rmi.RemoteException
                          |
                          +--java.rmi.ServerError
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ServerError
extends RemoteException

A ServerError is thrown as a result of a remote method call if the execution of the remote method on the server machine throws a java.lang.Error. The ServerError contains a nested exception which is the java.lang.Error that occurred during remote method execution.

Since:
JDK1.1
See Also:
Serialized Form
